column6:
Ahh, Reed Richards. Ever absent-minded. When the Fantastic Four helps to raise money for a block renovation, Reed runs an "I'll fix anything!" booth, and in between putting booster rockets on mopeds and laser cannons in wristwatches, he sort of, you know, accidentally fixes the Mad Thinker's android. Oops. Now it's the Mad Thinker and his Awesome Android versus the Fantastic Four and some toasters. Yeah, I said toasters.,2008,3
All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Tom Grummett | artist:David Hahn | colorist:Lee Loughridge | letterer:Nate Piekos | writer:Paul Tobin
